channel.title: Retros on Conor Lamb's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Retros on Conor Lamb's Blog

item.title: November 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~70% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Pink Pony Club - Chappell Roan - Pop Last month I was a bit too ambitious in my goal setting. I spent the last week of the month on holiday in the US, so I was unable to work on anything productive there. Before I left, I ended up being pretty busy as well. How did I do with last month’s goals?

item.title: October 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~90% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Boy Toy - STRFKR - Synth Pop October was interesting. I actually got the bulk of my goals completed within the first 2 weeks. But I’m tired of seeing people and parties. I didn’t get a lot of time for head space or extra curricular work. I’ve also been sick for like 3 weeks. How did I do with last month’s goals?

item.title: September 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~85% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): 1000 Times - Big Blood - Indie Pop Summer is officially over so it’s time to get back to work. How did I do with last month’s goals? Work None this month. Music - Solo Project | Band Project Release Chlorine Videos Results: A I edited the videos for my new single. I also made a plan for when to release them with a focus on iterative improvement of views and learning how to release tiktoks/reels.

item.title: July 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: A bit of indecision on moving forward with projects, and slow progress, but fun summer activities.

item.title: June 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: June was hella busy with fun stuff and admin for switching jobs.

item.title: April/May 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: 2 months with lots of travel and starting a new job.

item.title: January 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: 2 months with lots of travel and starting a new job.

item.title: 2023 Goals Review, 2024 Goals Plan
item.description: I achieved 1 goal, and the rest were meh.
